content:
Send Template-Based Automated Messages in WhatsApp

Using a flow, automatically send customers template-based messages in standard or enhanced WhatsApp channels to update them about cases, orders, or something else. Unlike freeform WhatsApp messages, template-based messages can be sent to opted-in customers at any time regardless of when the customer last sent a message.

This feature requires the WhatsApp Outbound Messages SKU. You can create and use up to 250 templates for one WhatsApp Business account.

Creating WhatsApp Templates in Salesforce

Any automated message that you send in a standard or enhanced WhatsApp channel must be based on a template that WhatsApp has approved. Each message template is language- and country-specific.

The method that you use to create a template depends on whether you plan to use it in standard or enhanced WhatsApp channels.

Standard WhatsApp
To use a template in standard WhatsApp channels, submit the template to Salesforce via email for approval by WhatsApp. The approval process takes 2–5 business days. Then, recreate the template in Setup and set up a flow to send it.
Enhanced WhatsApp
To use a template in enhanced WhatsApp channels, create your template in WhatsApp Business Manager and submit it there for approval. Approval usually just takes a moment. When it’s approved, create a notification messaging component in Salesforce that’s linked to your template. Then, set up a flow to send it.

How Template Categories Work

When you submit a WhatsApp template for approval, you must select one of WhatsApp’s three official template categories for your template.

Migrating Message Templates

Each WhatsApp template that you create is associated with a WhatsApp Business account (WABA). If you’re upgrading or migrating to an enhanced WhatsApp channel from a standard channel or other business service provider, you can copy the templates from your original WABA to the WABA associated with your enhanced channel.

If you plan to migrate message templates from one WABA to another, keep these considerations in mind.

title: Configuring Automated Messages in WhatsApp Service Cloud
